content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 16: Minister for Home Affairs Om Prakash Aryal has instructed the Traffic Police to work with high morale. He gave this directive while observing the Kathmandu Valley Traffic Police Office here today. On the occasion, Home Minister Aryal was briefed by the Chief of the Kathmandu Valle

title: Home Minister directs Traffic Police to work with high morale
